channel.title: [508] PuPPy-PvPeRs [508]
channel.description:
Hey, this is 508 server, i made it many months ago, and this is me first server i ever made and the first topic i ever made :), sorry no pics added, but lot of commands, great pvping.
Some of the commands listed below: ::givemod ::giveadmin ::givecoowner ::giveowner ::demote ::hail ::lol - dance + make funny dialogue ::rangepure - range pure gear ::puremelee - melee gear ::purehybrid - mage/range/melee gear (pure) ::pure - get pure stats ::master - get master stats ::money - some mills to start spawning ::item <id> <amount> - to spawn things ::sellall - sell all youre inventory ::pvp - go pvp with new gfx ::multi - go multi zone ::customs - get all custom items, u need client to see. ::kick - kicks player off server for 2-5 secs ::afk - sit for 60 secs if u go afk ::back - get back faster if u came back ::god - fly ::godoff - stop flying ::commands - view all posible commands ::magepure - mage pures gear ::bestweps - all best weapon ::capest - all skillcapes (t) ::rules - view rules ::urban - urban gear ::ammo - all arrows and bolts ::veng - switches to lunar + gives u runes for it ::vans - vansy gear ::f2p - free to play equipment ::defbonus - 99 def items ::epic - epic gear ::maxed - str bonus items ::food - food ::obby - mauler items obby ::rangetank - 40 def range items ::levelids - see this for leveling ::lvl <id> <xp amount> - to level stats ::pots - kewl potions ::runes - runes to mage up
This source is very good, cause i added givemod and giveadmin and those things. Ipban and ban works - 100% ipmute and mute works tho - 100% Here is the dl link -----> http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JKN8OWH0
Credits: me - 20% blue-dds source -30% z508 source - 30% mithpkz source - 5% google and other webpages - 10%
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JKN8OWH0

item.title: [508] PuPPy-PvPeRs [508]
item.dc:creator: @arturspkscape arturspkscape
item.description:
@arturspkscape wrote:

Hey, this is 508 server, i made it many months ago, and this is me first server i ever made and the first topic i ever made :), sorry no pics added, but lot of commands, great pvping.

Some of the commands listed below:
::givemod
::giveadmin
::givecoowner
::giveowner
::demote
::hail
::lol - dance + make funny dialogue
::rangepure - range pure gear
::puremelee - melee gear
::purehybrid - mage/range/melee gear (pure)
::pure - get pure stats
::master - get master stats
::money - some mills to start spawning
::item - to spawn things
::sellall - sell all youre inventory
::pvp - go pvp with new gfx
::multi - go multi zone
::customs - get all custom items, u need client to see.
::kick - kicks player off server for 2-5 secs
::afk - sit for 60 secs if u go afk
::back - get back faster if u came back
::god - fly
::godoff - stop flying
::commands - view all posible commands
::magepure - mage pures gear
::bestweps - all best weapon
::capest - all skillcapes (t)
::rules - view rules
::urban - urban gear
::ammo - all arrows and bolts
::veng - switches to lunar + gives u runes for it
::vans - vansy gear
::f2p - free to play equipment
::defbonus - 99 def items
::epic - epic gear
::maxed - str bonus items
::food - food
::obby - mauler items obby
::rangetank - 40 def range items
::levelids - see this for leveling
::lvl - to level stats
::pots - kewl potions
::runes - runes to mage up

This source is very good, cause i added givemod and giveadmin and those things.
Ipban and ban works - 100%
ipmute and mute works tho - 100%
Here is the dl link -----> http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JKN8OWH0

            Credits:
                             me - 20%
             blue-dds source -30%
                 z508 source - 30%
              mithpkz source - 5%

google and other webpages - 10%

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JKN8OWH0

Read full topic
